evidence.claim: HCM utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure.
The company follows HIPAA regulations for health data processing.
HCM supports X12 EDI for healthcare claim processing.
Integration with FHIR for electronic health records is available.
Using GCP for data analytics and processing healthcare information.
